Vicente Nava

Software Engineer, Web development enthusiast

About

I'm a software engineer with a passion for web development, proficient in JavaScript and skilled in frontend frameworks like React, Astro, and Svelte. I have experience consuming and building REST APIs and some knowledge in backend technologies such as Node, Express JS, and SQLite. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn new things.
